column5: My place is close to Toyota soccer stadium, Morgan's Wonderland, Downtown/Alamo/Riverwalk (10 miles), Splashtown, Schlitterbahn, Six Flags Fiesta Texas, Sea World, San Marcos outlets, Botanical Gardens. Grocery store and restaurants are also within walking distance. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
